pricePlans.title: One-time cleanser
bullets: Access for 30 days - enough time to one cleanse and two weeks of 80/20.
After 30 days you can renew or become a member through a subscription plan.

pricePlans.title: Subscription Plan
bullets: Unlimited access to all features as long as you are a member.

testamonials.quote: I truly never felt better than after completing your 14-day cleanse and it has become my everyday guideline for healthy eating
testamonials.author: Kate B.

testamonials.quote: I also truly never felt better than after completing your 14-day cleanse and it has become my everyday guideline for healthy eating
testamonials.author: Kate D.
